org.jenkinsci.plugins.pipeline.modeldefi.value:
set -euxo pipefail echo "whoami=$(id -un) uid=$(id -u)"
# ========= Docker CLI ========= if ! command -v docker >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo "[INFO] Installing Docker CLI… (trying Debian repo first)" apt-get update -y apt-get install -y docker.io || true fi
if ! command -v docker >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo "[INFO] Installing Docker CLI… (Docker official repo)" apt-get update -y apt-get install -y ca-certificates curl gnupg install -m 0755 -d /etc/apt/keyrings curl -fsSL https://download.docker.com/linux/debian/gpg | gpg --dearmor -o /etc/apt/keyrings/docker.gpg echo "deb [arch=$(dpkg --print-architecture) signed-by=/etc/apt/keyrings/docker.gpg] https://download.docker.com/linux/debian bookworm stable" > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/docker.list apt-get update -y apt-get install -y docker-ce-cli || true fi
command -v docker >/dev/null || { echo "[ERROR] Docker CLI still missing"; exit 1; } docker --version || true
# ========= Compose v2 / v1 ========= COMPOSE_BIN="" if docker compose version >/dev/null 2>&1; then COMPOSE_BIN="docker compose" else echo "[INFO] Trying to install compose v2 plugin…" apt-get update -y apt-get install -y docker-compose-plugin || true if docker compose version >/dev/null 2>&1; then COMPOSE_BIN="docker compose" else echo "[INFO] Falling back to compose v1 (docker-compose)…" apt-get install -y docker-compose || true if command -v docker-compose >/dev/null 2>&1; then COMPOSE_BIN="docker-compose" fi end if fi
if [ -z "$COMPOSE_BIN" ]; then echo "[ERROR] No compose (v2 or v1) available"; exit 1 fi echo "COMPOSE_BIN='$COMPOSE_BIN'" > .compose_bin
# ========= Docker socket ========= test -S /var/run/docker.sock || { echo "[ERROR] /var/run/docker.sock not mounted in Jenkins"; exit 2; }
# Diagnóstico opcional . .compose_bin $COMPOSE_BIN -f "${COMPOSE_FILE_PATH}" ps || true

set -euxo pipefail . .compose_bin || true COMPOSE_BIN="${COMPOSE_BIN:-docker compose}"
CMD="spark-submit --master ${SPARK_MASTER_URL} --conf spark.hadoop.fs.defaultFS=${HDFS_URI} ${TRAIN_SCRIPT}"
if [ -f "${COMPOSE_FILE_PATH}" ]; then echo "[RUN] $COMPOSE_BIN -f ${COMPOSE_FILE_PATH} exec -T pyspark-client bash -lc "$CMD"" $COMPOSE_BIN -f "${COMPOSE_FILE_PATH}" exec -T pyspark-client bash -lc "$CMD" else echo "[WARN] ${COMPOSE_FILE_PATH} not found; trying docker exec → pyspark-client" CID="$(docker ps -qf 'name=pyspark-client')" [ -n "$CID" ] || { echo "[ERROR] container 'pyspark-client' not running"; exit 3; } docker exec -i "$CID" bash -lc "$CMD" fi
